name: lora-workspace
description: Lora - Personal AI Mobile App Builder

scripts.dev: npm run cleanup && concurrently -k -n bridge,expo -c blue,magenta "npm run bridge" "npm run expo"
scripts.bridge: cd bridge-server && npm run build && npm start
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd bridge-server && npm install && cd ../mobile && npm install
scripts.cleanup: lsof -ti:19006 | xargs -r kill -9 2>/dev/null || true; lsof -ti:8081 | xargs -r kill -9 2>/dev/null || true; lsof -ti:8765 | xargs -r kill -9 2>/dev/null || true; echo 'Cleanup complete'
